content.raw: I'm talking about additional properties, in my case this property would be a NDVI value that I want to assign to a model and cool would also be if one could specify this similar to a heightmap. Other possible properties could be other surface properties that you can't or don't want to model but you want to be able to create a sensor that can read out these properties.
